name: Not-A-Vania
description:
This is a test project I made with GDevelop and free resources available on Itch.io and Opengameart.org. There is only 1 stage, but I will be posting the project files at some point so people can use it as an example/see how I completed this.

Controls: 

  • WASD/directions for Movement
  • Space/Numpad 5 for jump
  • T/Numpad 4 for attack
  • G/Numpad 6 for dodge-dash (ground only)
  • Home to restart current stage.
